description: Curious about enhancing your OOP skills? Tired of being coupled to Symfony/Doctrine? With this simple game we will force ourselves to discover various emergent patterns just by banishing the extends. It starts with the controllers, the forms, the repositories, and goes on. Don’t be scared. We’ll just have to go deeper into the components we used in Symfony 3.
title: Let's play a game: No extends. Advanced OOP with Symfony 3
